plays.text: Goal scored by Bobby Holik assisted by Scott Niedermayer

Penalty to Barrett Heisten 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Gomez

Goal scored by Eric Lindros assisted by Theo Fleury and Brian Leetch

Penalty to Petr Nedved 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Sergei Brylin
Goal scored by Brian Rafalski assisted by Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Hooking Petr Sykora
Goal scored by Brian Rafalski assisted by Bobby Holik and Patrik Elias
Penalty to Jason Arnott 2 minutes for Hooking Sandy McCarthy
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Hooking Petr Nedved
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Brian Leetch and Vladimir Malakhov
